$schema.description: Defines the schema to use for an item.

name.description: A unique identifier for the page across the whole report.

displayName.description: A user facing name for this page.

displayOption.description: Defines how the page is scaled.

height.description: Height of the page (in pixels) - optional only for 'DeprecatedDynamic' option, required otherwise.

width.description: Width of the page (in pixels) - optional only for 'DeprecatedDynamic' option, required otherwise.

filterConfig.description: Filters that apply to all the visuals on this page - on top of the filters defined for the whole report.

pageBinding.description: Additional metadata defined for how this page is used (tooltip, drillthrough, etc).

objects.description: Defines the formatting for different objects on a page.

type.description: Specific usage of this page (for example drillthrough).

anyOf.description: Page to be used as drillthrough.
Page to be used as tooltip.

visibility.description: Defines when this page should be visible - by default it is always visible.

anyOf.description: Page is always shown in the pages list
Page is not visible when viewing report in View mode.

visualInteractions.description:
Defines how data point selection on a specific visual flow (as filters) to other visuals on the page.
By default it is up-to the visual to apply it either as a cross-highlight or as a filter.

autoPageGenerationConfig.description: Configuration that was used to automatically generate a page (for example using 'Auto create the report' option).

annotations.description: Additional information to be saved (for example comments, readme, etc) for this page.

howCreated.description: Source of creation of this page.

anyOf.description: Page is generated by user interaction.
Page is created by copilot.

No dynamic page without width or height.
Deprecated: Use other display options.
Page is scaled so both width and height fit on the current viewport.
Only width is scaled to fit on the current viewport, height will be updated to maintain page aspect ratio.
No scaling is done - page is centered relative to the report canvas.

No scaling is done - page is anchored to top-left corder relative to the report canvas.
Deprecated: Use ActualSize instead.

name.description: Name of this binding - unique across the report.

type.description: Specific usage of this binding (for example drillthrough).

referenceScope.description: What is the scope under which the binding applies.

anyOf.description: Scope is restricted to the report.
Scope is across reports - for cross-report drillthrough.

parameters.description: Additional parameters to apply when the binding is invoked.

acceptsFilterContext.description: Should additional filter context flow when applying the binding.

anyOf.description: Flows filter context
Additional filter context does not flow to the binding.
No specific usage of this binding.
Binding to be used as drillthrough.
Binding to be used as tooltip page.

name.description: Name of the parameter - unique across the report.

boundFilter.description: Name of the filter which this parameter affects.

asAggregation.description: The parameter should be applied when the field of the filter is aggregated.

qnaSingleSelectRequired.description: Exactly one instance value should be picked as a filter for this parameter.

source.description: Visual name that will be the source of user interaction (selecting data point for example).

target.description: Visual name for the target of the interaction (selecting data point for example).

type.description: How should the interaction flow from source to target visual (as highlights, as filter, none).

selectedFields.description: Data fields to use for the auto page generation

layout.description: The specific layout chosen to render the auto-visuals

fields.description: Specific data fields used to build this visual from the full set of selected fields

related.description: A layout that has 1 hero visual and some related visuals
